summary: A Jewish WWII survivor revisits the ruins of a hellish concentration camp, and the memories are still vivid. How did she escape the humiliation, the tortures, and the destruction of human flesh? How did she flee from Gestapo's last orgy?
cast: Adriano Micantoni|Daniela Poggi|Maristella Greco|Fulvio Ricciardi|Antiniska Nemour|Caterina Barbero|Domenico Seren Gay|Vittorio Joderi|Pietro Bosco|Pietro Vial|Renato Paracchi|Maria Grazia Cisera|Tino Polenghi|Achille Grioni
title: La última orgía de la Gestapo
